瀡瀡瀡

瀡字的基本解释

瀡
suǐ
〔滫（
xi?）瀡〕淘米水，如“瀡瀡以滑之，脂膏以膏之。”

瀡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［suǐ］
［《廣韻》思累切，去寘，心。］
［《集韻》選委切，上紙，心。］
亦作“1”。
(1)使食物柔滑的佐料。
(2)指用这种佐料烹调的食物。

瀡字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　瀡； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页660第13
【廣韻】【集韻】思累切【韻會】【正韻】息委切，?音髓。【玉篇】滑也。【禮·內則】滫瀡以滑之。【註】齊人滑曰瀡。　又【集韻】髓隨切。義同。

瀡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
瀡字的起名意思

暂无。

slick
Basic explanation of words
slick
suǐ
〔滫（
xi?) 瀡] To wash rice water, such as "smoothing 瀡瀡 to slip, grease to anoint it."
slick
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［suǐ］
["Guangyun" is tired of thinking, put away, heart. ]
["Ji Yun" selected commissions, put on paper, heart. ]
Also known as "1".
(1) Condiments that make food smooth.
(2) Refers to food cooked with this condiment.
slick
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Water Word Department】　瀡; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 660 13
【Guang Yun】【Ji Yun】Think tired and cut 【Rhyme Meeting】【Zheng Yun】Cut and cut, the essence of sound. [Jade articles] Slippery. 【Rite·Nei Ze】Smoothly. [Note] Qi people slid and said 瀡.　[Jiyun] Cut the marrow with it. The same meaning.
